answers.answer: Hi H, just how was your erections before you tried to have sex?Were they good and hard?Or are they about the same as when you had sex?How old are you?Are you in good health?Are you over weight?

There are many causes of weak erections.  Main causes were1)Aging is the primary factor for weak erections.  As the men ages, his testosterone levels begin to decrease.  So it is harder to get strong erection.2)Health problems like High blood pressure and Diabetes3)Life style factors such as lack of exercise, smog and drugs.

question: I first time tried to had sex with a virgin girl but failed. Reason. The penis could not erect perpendicular. I tried holding on my hand and then pushed it in the girl but again could not insert it inside. What is the problem and pls advice me if any sort of treatment is required. I can although release at the right time.
title: PENIS DOES NOT GET HARD
